chapters.title: Prologue: The First Sparks Fall
chapters.info: Dragon Reborn, p. 23 (20)—According to the Karaethon Cycle, the man who is the Rebirth of Lews Therin Telamon, the Dragon. He is prophesied to fight the Dark One in Tarmon Gai'don, the Last Battle—it is said that he will save the World, and Break it again. See also Ablar, Logain; al'Thor, Rand; Amalasan, Guaire; Car'a'carn; Coramoor; Dragon, The; He Who Comes With the Dawn; Taim, Mazrim; Telamon, Lews Therin.
